alert.note: Alert for Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Aitkin and central Pine Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 815 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Malmo, or near Mille Lacs Lake, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Aitkin and central Pine Counties, including the following locations... Grindstone Lake Pine County, Finlayson, Friesland and Banning State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.
